creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: seated man with long beard, with a woman in a fur-trimmed hat behind him; burner with 2 teapots in foreground; table with foliage bouquet in vase, box and cup in background
dimension:
61 7/8 x 35 7/16 in. (157.16 x 90.01 cm) (image)
97 1/16 x 36 1/2 in. (246.54 x 92.71 cm) (overall, without roller)
inscription:
Inscription and Seals

ULC, in black: untranslated inscription
markings: below inscription, in red: three seals; LRC, in red: one seal
title: Beauty in Winter
